price: এই সকলোবোৰ হৈছে বেয়া কৰ্ম, তোমাৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ ওচৰত ঘৃণনীয়।
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
